org.eclipse.swt.examples.paint

クラス ContainerFigure

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.swt.examples.paint.Figure
      • org.eclipse.swt.examples.paint.ContainerFigure

  • public class ContainerFigure
extends Figure
    Container for Figure objects with stacking preview mechanism.

    • コンストラクタのサマリー

      コンストラクタ 
      コンストラクタと説明
      ContainerFigure()
      Constructs an empty Container

    • メソッドのサマリー

      メソッド 
      修飾子とタイプ メソッドと説明
      void add(Figure object)
      Adds an object to the container for later drawing.
      void addDamagedRegion(FigureDrawContext fdc, org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Region region)
      Computes the damaged screen region caused by drawing this object (imprecise), then appends it to the supplied region.
      void clear()
      Clears the container.
      void draw(FigureDrawContext fdc)
      Draws this object.
      boolean isEmpty()
      Determines if the container is empty.

      • クラスから継承されたメソッド java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • コンストラクタの詳細

      • ContainerFigure

        public ContainerFigure()
        Constructs an empty Container

    • メソッドの詳細

      • add

        public void add(Figure object)
        Adds an object to the container for later drawing.
        パラメータ:
        object - the object to add to the drawing list

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Determines if the container is empty.
        戻り値:
        true if the container is empty

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Clears the container.

        Note that erasePreview() cannot be called after this point to erase any previous drawPreview()'s.

      • draw

        public void draw(FigureDrawContext fdc)
        クラスからコピーされた説明: Figure
        Draws this object.
        定義:
        draw クラス内 Figure
        パラメータ:
        fdc - a parameter block specifying drawing-related information

      • addDamagedRegion

        public void addDamagedRegion(FigureDrawContext fdc,
                    org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Region region)
        クラスからコピーされた説明: Figure
        Computes the damaged screen region caused by drawing this object (imprecise), then appends it to the supplied region.
        定義:
        addDamagedRegion クラス内 Figure
        パラメータ:
        fdc - a parameter block specifying drawing-related information
        region - a region to which additional damage areas will be added
